Case Study

Buffalo Store

BuffaloCorp needed a better e-commerce experience, particularly around navigation and product search.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

BuffaloCorp needed a better e-commerce experience, particularly around navigation and product search.

Approach

How we solved it

Redesigned the storefront with a jQuery-powered mega menu and custom Gutenberg blocks for a better product discovery flow.

Completed

May 2022

Website

https://www.buffalocorpstore.com/

Stack highlights

  • WordPress
  • jQuery
  • WooCommerce
  • PHP
